record.name: Notify User to Order From Catalog

rule.condition: null(cartId in $L.file) and $G.bg=false and nullsub($log.catalog, false)=false and nullsub($G.ess, false)=false
rule.conditionDesc: ( Expression: null(cartId in $L.file) and $G.bg=false and nullsub($log.catalog, false)=false and nullsub($G.ess,false)=false)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"null(cartId in $L.file) and $G.bg=false and nullsub($log.catalog, false)=false and nullsub($G.ess,false)=false"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Call the "sd.svc.prompt.user.order.from.catalog" process. (when ( Expression: null(cartId in $L.file) and $G.bg=false and nullsub($log.catalog, false)=false and nullsub($G.ess,false)=false))
